column3: â€œBeen a while since I've had it but I remember this one being just amazing. One of the best sativa buzzes I've ever had. Energetic and giggly. Tons of fun in groups. A friend who usually finds more paranoia while smoking than anything else said this was the most enjoyable" strain he had tried. Depression and anxiety are gone on this one. A favorite for me!â€"

â€œThis strain is really good for the daytime.  It causes me to feel extremely uplifted and very talkative.  I suffer from depression and anxiety, and this strain has quickly become a top strain for my personal needs.â€

â€œWhat happens when you cross 2 world class Sativas? You get this oh so sweet and piney Sour Jack. The smell and taste are incredible. Thereâ€™s sweet, piney, and diesel all going on at the same time. Great heady uplifting effects that just puts you in a good mood. Recommended for depression, minor aches and pain, stress relief, and thought provoking creativity. Keeps the mind busy.â€

â€œVisual Appearance: Light green with even coloration. Light density of brown sinsemilla. Trichomes golden and globby around buds. 'hairy' frost around bud margins.

Physical Consistency: Hard and dense, but nug tears with significant juicyness.

Pre-Smoke Odor: Intensely pungent mint and pine like flavors. Fresh and crisp aroma.

Post Smoke Odor: Clean and smooth with pleasantly pine-scented aftertaste. 

Effe...â€

â€œSour Jack is a great strain if you need to get stuff done. It gives a nice high head feeling. Your body is relaxed and comfortable. I recommend this strain for anybody who has OCD or/and depression.â€
â€œLove it!!! Great for going out. No fatigue and and bit of the giggles.â€

â€œI could not stop talking. 

I don't talk a lot normally.

It was was like I had no anxiety whatsoever.

I have social anxiety normally.

definitely a unique daytime strainâ€

â€œ4.5  Niiiiiiiiiiice.  Two great strains come together in this one.   I did like it, but probably not quite as much as sour diesel or Jack Here by themselves.  Made my smile. This was a very effective strain mid afternoon, when I needed a boost of energy (and wanted to be high, of course.).â€

â€œGreat body buzz, great daytime smoke without causing tiredness or a crash, its a VERY SUPERIOR strain and is BETTER than the sum of its parts... Jack Herer is good, Sour Diesel is one of my fav's, but if u find sour jack, the slight upcharge is WELLL WORTH IT!!!   A++++â€

â€œI really liked this strain simply because it was the first strain I that I experienced a Volcano vaporizer. The flavour that the vapor holds is amazing. I've been torching the flavor from my weed this whole time using my bong. So happy to have a Volcano now. <3

â€œThe lowest anxiety I've experienced from a sativa.â€

â€œTwo of my favorite strains in one! I had this via Shatter vape...super intense a Sativa lover's DREAM! Great for energy, depression and a fantastic pre-workout strain. The runner's high was out of this world!â€

â€œThis is perfect for people who have trouble waking up and getting their day going.

â€œThis is an intoxicating flower with a wonderful citrus aroma. The smoke wasn't harsh and it tasted better than other sour strains. The high was very relaxing compared to most sativas. Overall, this strain exceeded my expectations in every single way and left me with a smooth, comfortable, high.â€

column3: â€œSour Jack comes around herr once a year for a few weeks,and i grab every bit i can. One of those strains you wanna keep all for yourself.
